meanings.sent1: The new employee may mislabel the products if they are not trained properly.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to mislabel the packages to avoid confusion.
meanings.sent3: Oops! I accidentally mislabel the boxes with the wrong names.
meanings.sent4: Her tendency to mislabel things led to some hilarious mix-ups in the office.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of a mislabel can be costly for the company.

meanings.sent1: The mislabel on the jar caused confusion among the customers.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check for any mislabels on the products before shipping them out.
meanings.sent3: I received a package with a mislabel that said 'fragile' when it was actually 'handle with care'.
meanings.sent4: The mislabel on the map led us to the wrong destination.
meanings.sent5: The mislabel was quickly corrected to avoid any misunderstandings.
